title: Follow the Melody
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hnn~.... Riko-chan, your piano tune is truly wonderful! You really are close with pianos huh…. It’s mesmerizing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I-, is that so? You’re embarrassing me….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Why are you embarrassed? Did I say something wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Not at all! I’m really happy! But, I don’t really think I deserve it, or something like that….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeh~. I thought it fits Riko-chan perfectly though!? A really gentle, smooth tune…. It makes you want to sing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu…. Alright, I accept your words, Emma-san. Thinking of it as highly as that truly makes me happy. Ah, that’s right! Emma-san, I’ll play a song you like, so won’t you sing along to my piano tune?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeh! Can I!? Yaay~! Then, what song should we go with…. I have too many songs I like that it’s hard to pick…. Umm, umm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I can play them all! I want to hear your singing too, Emma-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Riko-chan, I love you! Alright then, the first song will be 「Do-Re-Mi」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
